zh.title: 美国冻结伊朗在美资产
波兰团结工会被宣布为非法
内华达火山爆发导致重大伤亡
东西德正式签署统一条约
柬埔寨和平协议在巴黎签署
欧洲空间局火星快车发射升空
国际货币基金组织改革方案通过
美国最高法院审理同性婚姻案件
印尼通过新刑法禁止婚外性行为

en.title: Spain relinquished control of Western Sahara to Morocco and Mauritania.
Lech Walesa, Solidarity leader, released from internment in Poland.
Nevado del Ruiz volcano eruption triggered deadly mudslides in Colombia.
Germany formally ratified the treaty confirming reunification.
American Airlines Flight 1420 crashed in Little Rock, Arkansas.
Channel Tunnel officially opened by Queen Elizabeth II and François Mitterrand.
Astronomers announced the discovery of Sedna, a distant planetoid.
China's Communist Party Congress concluded, Xi Jinping appointed General Secretary.
Taylor Swift's "The Eras Tour" became the highest-grossing concert tour of all time.
